articles.description: Internet users should exercise caution while installing Google Chrome extensions as the company has removed over 100 malicious links after they were found collecting "sensitive" user data, country's cyber-security agency said on Wednesday.

articles.author: Jeramy Johnson
articles.title: How to use the map to browse photos by places in Google Photos - Android Central
articles.description: With the latest update to Google Photos, users can now more easily find their favorite pictures by where they were taken. We'll show you how to access the new places feature so that you can call up old memories just by looking at a map.
articles.content: We have loved Google Photos since it was embedded in the now-defunct Google+ social network (RIP Google+), and the service has continued to evolve and set the standard for cloud-based photo storage o… [+1097 chars]
